name: Bull's Hit
description:
Matador Man is the world's first bull-based superhero - and he's making a name for himself. Save office workers from a bull, whilst taking dramatic photos for the press

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Left Shift to dash
  • Space to attract bull
  • E to drop office workers (Photos will only be taken when picking up a worker)

Made for Mini Jam 87 - https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-87-break/rate/1169342
